types.description: L3G4200D gyroscope input node. After each tick in its TICK port, a new reading is output on each of its output ports.

in_ports.description: Packets sent in here will trigger a gyroscope reading and produce packets on each of the the output ports.
in_ports.name: TICK

types.name: gyroscope/l3g4200d

members.description: Output in rad/s, instead of deg/s
members.name: output_radians

out_ports.description: Angular speed in all X/Y/Z axes, in the selected output unit
out_ports.name: OUT
